availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas L. Garrard Jr. (Resident Pendleton County )

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas L. Garrard Sr., and America Garrard. Resident of Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Find A Grave, "Thomas L Garrard (1833-1879)," Memorial #43076626, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/43076626 (accessed October 3,2018).
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District2, p. 326A.
